nodes.text: Akim's Munch was a street cafe located in Mos Espa. Despite often serving undercooked and stringy food, that cafe had its regulars, including Sebulba, a renowned Podracer. Before his defeat in the Boonta Eve Classic, Sebulba often hung out here, bragging of his victories to the great delight of his fans. Quinlan Vos was sitting in the cafe in 32 BBY when Jar Jar Binks was attacked by Sebulba and subsequently saved by Anakin Skywalker.

It sometimes hosted a Bith band and the Jawa musician Tili Tili. Notable patrons were an Ithorian, a Mon Calamari, a Morseerian, a being with two heads, and a brick red-colored beaked being. Around the year 32 BBY, a young Jedi recruit visited the cantina to record songs for the the benefit of Anakin Skywalker.
